title: WeekOfYear (Function)
text:
FUNCTION WeekOfYear :
ERROR
Calculates the appropriate values of the ISO week date parts that matches the parameter
uliDateTime
.
WeekOfYear(JoinDateTime(2008,
12,
29,
0,
0,
0,
0))
=>
uiYear:=2009
,
uiWeek:=1,
eWeekday:=WEEKDAY.MONDAY
WeekOfYear(JoinDateTime(2010,
1,
3,
0,
0,
0,
0))
=>
uiYear:=2009
,
uiWeek:=53,
eWeekday:=WEEKDAY.SUNDAY
See:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ISO_week_date
